column5: Careful boys ...Grinder is going to be on Lac Seul in June...And he is one Walleye Fishing machine.
huh? who is grinder? since I am going to be on that same trip, I would love to know. Is hop a long coming for sure too?
Grinder and Hop a Long are one in the same....Doesent hardly seem fair having two Polocks fishing against just six guys. Going to be a helluva whipping....reminds me of Nebraska stomping the Vols.
Are both of those Polocks going to try to cross the border at the same time. Hope the border crossing Guard can talk slow enough.
Yes, we both will cross the border at the same time...we have our green cards.
